ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to the next stage which is Contract or mark the Opportunity as Discontinued
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercialisation', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,'Negotiate'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Contract')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Discontinued')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to next stage which is Contract or choose to discontinue the opportunity
